name: Trial and Error (Mix And Game Jam 2020 Submission)
name_original: Trial and Error (Mix And Game Jam 2020 Submission)
description:
You are Figaro, an artisan pizza chef who is fed up with robots taking over the restaurant industry. Take the fight to them in this (one) turn-based tactical shooter.

Plan out your moves and then click the door icon to enter the level and execute them.

Use WSAD to move the camera around.
